trans-unit.source: Multisample Antialiasing

trans-unit.source: Multisample Render Targets

trans-unit.source: Multisample antialiasing is a hardware feature where the hardware calculates a coverage value per pixel in the primitive. Some hardware can multisample at a very low cost, while other hardware may need both more memory and more GPU cycles to render a frame.
trans-unit.target: 多采样抗锯齿是一种硬件功能,硬件会计算基元中每个像素的覆盖值。一些硬件可以以很低的成本进行多采样,而其他硬件可能需要更多的内存和更多的GPU周期来渲染一帧画面。

trans-unit.source: Multisample antialiasing is applied.
trans-unit.target: 应用多样本抗锯齿。

trans-unit.source: Multisampling
trans-unit.target: Multisampling

trans-unit.source: Multisampling support requires support for multisampled renderbuffers and framebuffer blits. On OpenGL ES 2.0 implementations it is likely that these will not be present. This means that multisampling will not be available. With modern OpenGL versions and OpenGL ES 3.0 and up this is usually not a problem anymore.
trans-unit.target: 多采样支持需要支持多采样渲染缓冲区和帧缓冲区blits。在OpenGL ES 2.0的实现中,很可能不存在这些功能。这意味着多采样将不可用。在现代OpenGL版本和OpenGL ES 3.0及以上版本中,这通常不再是一个问题。

trans-unit.source: NFC
trans-unit.target: NFC

trans-unit.source: NFC Forum Tags can contain one or more messages in a standardized format. These messages are encapsulated by the QNdefMessage class. Use the registerNdefMessageHandler() functions to register message handlers with particular criteria. Handlers can be unregistered with the unregisterNdefMessageHandler() function.
trans-unit.target: NFC论坛标签可以包含一种或多种标准化格式的消息。这些消息由QNdefMessage类封装。使用registerNdefMessageHandler（）函数注册具有特定条件的消息处理程序。可以使用unregisterNdefMessageHandler（）函数注销处理程序。

trans-unit.source: NFC Forum devices generally operate as the master in master/slave communications. Some devices are also capable of operating as the slave, so called Card Emulation mode. In this mode the local NFC device emulates a NFC Forum Tag or Contactless Card.
trans-unit.target: NFC论坛设备一般在主/从通信中作为主站运行。有些设备也能够作为从属设备操作,所以称为卡片仿真模式。在这种模式下,本地NFC设备会模拟NFC论坛标签或非接触式卡。

trans-unit.source: NFC Forum devices support two modes of communications. The first mode, peer-to-peer communications, is used to communicate between two NFC Forum devices. The second mode, master/slave communications, is used to communicate between an NFC Forum device and an NFC Forum Tag or Contactless Card. The targetDetected() signal is emitted when a target device enters communications range. Communications can be initiated from the slot connected to this signal.
trans-unit.target: NFC论坛设备支持两种通信模式。第一种模式，对等通信，用于在两个NFC论坛设备之间进行通信。第二种模式是主/从通信，用于在NFC论坛设备和NFC论坛标签或非接触卡之间进行通信。所述targetDetected当目标设备进入通信范围（）信号被发射。可以从连接到该信号的插槽开始通信。

trans-unit.source: NFC is an extremely short-range (less than 20 centimeters) wireless technology and has a maximum transfer rate of 424 kbit/s. NFC is ideal for transferring small packets of data when two devices are touched together.
trans-unit.target: NFC是一种极短距离(小于20厘米)的无线技术,最大传输速率为424kbit/s。当两台设备碰在一起时,NFC是传输小数据包的理想选择。

trans-unit.source: NFC on Linux
trans-unit.target: Linux上的NFC

trans-unit.source: NMEA is a commonly used protocol for the specification of one's global position at a certain point in time. The QNmeaPositionInfoSource class reads NMEA data and uses it to provide positional data in the form of QGeoPositionInfo objects.
trans-unit.target: NMEA是在某个时间点指定一个人的全球位置的常用协议。所述QNmeaPositionInfoSource类读取NMEA数据，并使用它的形式提供位置数据QGeoPositionInfo对象。

trans-unit.source: Native menus are implemented using Win32 API and are simpler than QMenu-based menus in for example that they do allow for placing widgets on them or changing properties like fonts and do not provide hover signals. They are mainly intended for Qt Quick. By default, they will be used if the application is not an instance of QApplication or for Qt Quick Controls 2 applications (since Qt 5.10).
trans-unit.target: 本机菜单是使用Win32 API实现的，并且比基于QMenu的菜单简单，例如，本机菜单允许在其上放置小部件或更改诸如字体之类的属性，并且不提供悬停信号。它们主要用于Qt Quick。默认情况下，如果应用程序不是QApplication的实例或Qt Quick Controls 2应用程序（自Qt 5.10起），将使用它们。

trans-unit.source: Native menus are implemented using Win32 API and are simpler than QMenu-based menus in for example that they do allow for placing widgets on them or changing properties like fonts and do not provide hover signals. They are mainly intended for Qt Quick. By default, they will be used if the application is not an instance of QApplication or for Qt Quick Controls 2 applications.
trans-unit.target: 本机菜单是使用Win32 API实现的，并且比基于QMenu的菜单简单，例如，本机菜单允许在其上放置小部件或更改诸如字体之类的属性，并且不提供悬停信号。它们主要用于Qt Quick。默认情况下，如果应用程序不是QApplication的实例或Qt Quick Controls 2应用程序的实例，则将使用它们。

trans-unit.source: Native widgets include toplevel widgets, QGLWidget, and child widgets on which winId() was called.
trans-unit.target: 本机窗口小部件包括顶级窗口小部件，QGLWidget和在其上调用了winId（）的子窗口小部件。

trans-unit.source: Network proxy is not used if the address used in connectToHost(), bind() or listen() is equivalent to QHostAddress::LocalHost or QHostAddress::LocalHostIPv6.
trans-unit.target: 如果connectToHost（），bind（）或listen（）中使用的地址等于QHostAddress :: LocalHost或QHostAddress :: LocalHostIPv6，则不使用网络代理。

trans-unit.source: Network requests are represented by the QNetworkRequest class, which also acts as a general container for information associated with a request, such as any header information and the encryption used. The URL specified when a request object is constructed determines the protocol used for a request. Currently HTTP and local file URLs are supported for uploading and downloading.
trans-unit.target: 网络请求由QNetworkRequest类表示，该类也充当与请求关联的信息（例如，任何标头信息和所使用的加密）的通用容器。构造请求对象时指定的URL确定用于请求的协议。当前，支持HTTP和本地文件URL进行上载和下载。

trans-unit.source: Network requests are represented by the QNetworkRequest class, which also acts as a general container for information associated with a request, such as any header information and the encryption used. The URL specified when a request object is constructed determines the protocol used for a request. Currently HTTP, FTP and local file URLs are supported for uploading and downloading.
trans-unit.target: 网络请求由QNetworkRequest类表示，该类也充当与请求关联的信息（例如，任何标头信息和所使用的加密）的通用容器。构造请求对象时指定的URL确定用于请求的协议。当前，支持HTTP，FTP和本地文件URL进行上载和下载。

trans-unit.source: Network requests can be re-enabled again, and this property will resume to reflect the actual device state by calling
trans-unit.target: 网络请求可以再次被重新启用,该属性将通过调用

trans-unit.source: Network sessions and their sockets can be bound to a particular network interface. Any packet that passes through the socket goes to the specified network interface and thus disregards standard routing table entries. This may be useful when two interfaces can reach overlapping IP ranges or an application has specific needs in regards to target networks. This option is platform specific and may not always be available.
trans-unit.target: 网络会话及其套接字可以绑定到一个特定的网络接口。任何通过套接字的数据包都会进入指定的网络接口,从而忽略了标准的路由表条目。当两个接口可以到达重叠的IP范围或应用程序对目标网络有特定需求时,这可能是有用的。这个选项是特定于平台的,可能并不总是可用。

trans-unit.source: Network sessions and their underlying access points can be started and stopped. If this flag is not set QNetworkSession can only monitor but not influence the state of access points. On some platforms this feature may require elevated user permissions. This option is platform specific and may not always be available.
trans-unit.target: 网络会话及其底层访问点可以启动和停止。如果未设置此标志，则QNetworkSession只能监视而不影响访问点的状态。在某些平台上，此功能可能需要提升的用户权限。此选项是特定于平台的，可能并不总是可用。

trans-unit.source: Network sessions and their underlying access points can be started and stopped. If this flag is not set QNetworkSession can only monitor but not influence the state of access points. On some platforms this feature may require elevated user permissions. This option is platform specific and may not always be available.
trans-unit.target: 网络会话及其底层接入点可以被启动和停止。如果不设置这个标志,QNetworkSession只能监控而不能影响接入点的状态。在某些平台上,该功能可能需要提升用户权限。这个选项是特定于平台的,可能并不总是可用。

trans-unit.source: Network transparency is supported throughout QML, for example, both the FontLoader and Image elements support loading resources from a remote server.
trans-unit.target: 整个QML都支持网络透明性，例如，FontLoader和Image元素均支持从远程服务器加载资源。

trans-unit.source: New elements are created and inserted into the document programmatically with a QTextCursor or by using an editor widget, such as QTextEdit. Elements can be given a particular format when they are created; otherwise they take the cursor's current format for the element.
trans-unit.target: 通过QTextCursor或使用编辑器小部件（例如QTextEdit）以编程方式创建新元素并将其插入到文档中。创建元素时，可以为其指定特定格式。否则，它们将使用光标当前元素的格式。

trans-unit.source: NoDraw is usually used as a child of a ClearBuffers node to prevent from drawing the scene when there are multiple render passes.

trans-unit.source: NoDraw should be used when the FrameGraph needs to set up some render states or clear some buffers without requiring any mesh to be drawn. It has the same effect as having a Qt3DRender::QRenderPassFilter that matches none of available Qt3DRender::QRenderPass instances of the scene without the overhead cost of actually performing the filtering.
trans-unit.target: 当FrameGraph需要设置某些渲染状态或清除某些缓冲区而无需绘制任何网格时，应使用NoDraw。它具有为具有相同的效果Qt3DRender :: QRenderPassFilter匹配没有可用的Qt3DRender :: QRenderPass现场的情况下，没有实际执行过滤的开销。

trans-unit.source: Nodes are inserted with insertBefore(), insertAfter() or appendChild(). You can replace one node with another using replaceChild() and remove a node with removeChild().
trans-unit.target: 使用insertBefore（），insertAfter（）或appendChild（）插入节点。您可以使用replaceChild（）将一个节点替换为另一个节点，并使用removeChild（）删除节点。

trans-unit.source: Nodes have a couple of enableRemoting() methods that are used to share objects on the network (this will produce an error if the Node is not a Host Node however). Other processes/devices that want to interact with a shared object use one of the node's acquire() methods to instantiate a replica.
trans-unit.target: 节点具有几个enableRemoting（）方法，用于共享网络上的对象（但是，如果节点不是主机节点，则会产生错误）。想要与共享库交互的其他进程/设备使用节点的acquire（）方法之一实例化副本。

trans-unit.source: Nodes have a few enableRemoting() methods that are used to share objects on the network. However, if the node is not a host node, an error is returned.
trans-unit.target: 节点具有一些enableRemoting（）方法，用于共享网络上的对象。但是，如果该节点不是主机节点，则返回错误。

trans-unit.source: Nodes have a virtual QSGNode::preprocess() function, which will be called before the scene graph is rendered. Node subclasses can set the flag QSGNode::UsePreprocess and override the QSGNode::preprocess() function to do final preparation of their node. For example, dividing a bezier curve into the correct level of detail for the current scale factor or updating a section of a texture.
trans-unit.target: 节点具有虚拟QSGNode :: preprocess（）函数，将在呈现场景图之前调用该函数。节点子类可以设置标志QSGNode :: UsePreprocess并重写QSGNode :: preprocess（）函数以对其节点进行最终准备。例如，将贝塞尔曲线划分为当前比例因子的正确细节级别，或更新纹理的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Nodes may connect to each other directly using connectToNode, or they can use the QRemoteObjectRegistry to simplify connections.
trans-unit.target: 节点可以使用connectToNode直接彼此连接，也可以使用QRemoteObjectRegistry简化连接。

trans-unit.source: Nodes only support connection to one registry, calling QRemoteObjectNode::setRegistryUrl when a Registry is already set is considered an error. For something like a secure and insecure network (where different Registries would be applicable), the recommendation is to create separate Nodes to connect to each, in effect creating two independent Qt Remote Objects networks.
trans-unit.target: 节点仅支持与一个注册表的连接，如果已经设置了注册表，则调用QRemoteObjectNode :: setRegistryUrl被视为错误。对于类似安全和不安全的网络（适用于不同的注册表）的建议，建议创建单独的节点以连接到每个节点，实际上是创建两个独立的Qt远程对象网络。

trans-unit.target: 节点本身并没有提供太多使用。但是，当您将QObject类添加到要共享的节点时，它们的价值就来了。然后，任何对等节点都可以从该对等节点请求共享对象的副本或实例。

trans-unit.source: Nonetheless, couldn't a template-based solution improve the performance of an application using signals and slots? While it is true that Qt adds a small overhead to the cost of calling a slot through a signal, the cost of the call is only a small proportion of the entire cost of a slot. Benchmarking against Qt's signals and slots system is typically done with empty slots. As soon as you do anything useful in your slots, for example a few simple string operations, the calling overhead becomes negligible. Qt's system is so optimized that anything that requires operator new or delete (for example, string operations or inserting/removing something from a template container) is significantly more expensive than emitting a signal.
trans-unit.target: 尽管如此,基于模板的解决方案难道不能提高使用信号和插槽的应用程序的性能吗?虽然Qt通过信号调用槽的成本确实增加了一小笔开销,但调用成本只占整个槽成本的一小部分。对Qt的信号和槽位系统进行基准测试,通常是在空槽位的情况下进行的。只要你在槽中做了任何有用的事情,例如一些简单的字符串操作,调用开销就会变得微不足道。Qt的系统是如此的优化,以至于任何需要操作符new或delete的操作(例如,字符串操作或从模板容器中插入/删除某些东西)都比发出信号要贵得多。

trans-unit.source: Nor does X11 provide a way to maximize a window. QWidget::showMaximized() has to emulate the feature. Its result depends on the result of QWidget::frameGeometry() and the capability of the window manager to do proper window placement, neither of which can be guaranteed.
trans-unit.target: X11也不提供最大化窗口的方法。QWidget :: showMaximized（）必须模拟该功能。其结果取决于QWidget :: frameGeometry（）的结果以及窗口管理器进行正确的窗口放置的能力，而这两者均无法保证。

trans-unit.source: Normal C++ classes and functions can be used from managed .NET code by providing thin wrapper classes written in MC++. The wrapper class will take care of forwarding the calls to the normal C++ functions or methods, and converting parameter data as necessary. Since the wrapper class is a managed class, it can be used without further ado in any managed .NET application, whether written in C#, VB.NET, MC++ or other managed programming language.
trans-unit.target: 通过提供用MC++编写的瘦包装器类,可以从托管的.NET代码中使用正常的C++类和函数。包装器类将负责转发对普通C++函数或方法的调用,并在必要时转换参数数据。由于包装器类是一个托管类,因此它可以在任何托管的.NET应用程序中使用,而无需再做任何修改,无论是用C#、VB.NET、MC++还是其他托管编程语言编写的。

trans-unit.source: Normally QML files can be loaded as types directly from other QML files, or using a qmldir file. This function allows registration of files to types from C++ code, such as when the type mapping needs to be procedurally determined at startup.

trans-unit.source: Normally a slider increases as it moves up or to the right; upsideDown indicates that it should do the opposite (increase as it moves down or to the left). The default value is false, i.e. the slider increases as it moves up or to the right.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下,滑块向上或向右移动时增加;倒立表示应该相反(向下或向左移动时增加)。默认值为false,即滑块向上或向右移动时增加。

trans-unit.source: Normally an action is added to a group by creating it with the group as its parent, so this function is not usually used.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下,一个操作是通过创建一个以组为父的组来添加到组中的,所以这个函数通常不被使用。

trans-unit.source: Normally an action is added to a group by creating it with the group as parent, so this function is not usually used.
trans-unit.target: 一般情况下,一个操作是通过创建一个以组为父的组来添加到组中的,所以这个函数通常不被使用。

trans-unit.source: Normally an application will not need to create its own QFocusFrame as QStyle will handle this detail for you. A style writer can optionally use a QFocusFrame to have a focus area outside of the widget's paintable geometry. In this way space need not be reserved for the widget to have focus but only set on a QWidget with QFocusFrame::setWidget. It is, however, legal to create your own QFocusFrame on a custom widget and set its geometry manually via QWidget::setGeometry however you will not get auto-placement when the focused widget changes size or placement.
trans-unit.target: 通常，应用程序不需要创建自己的QFocusFrame，因为QStyle将为您处理此细节。样式编写者可以选择使用QFocusFrame在小部件的可绘制几何图形之外具有焦点区域。这样，无需为小部件保留焦点就可以保留空间，而只需在具有QFocusFrame :: setWidget的QWidget上进行设置即可。但是，在自定义小部件上创建自己的QFocusFrame并通过QWidget :: setGeometry手动设置其几何形状是合法的，但是，当焦点小部件更改大小或放置时，您将不会自动放置。

trans-unit.source: Normally the QMatrix4x4 class keeps track of this special type internally as operations are performed. However, if the matrix is modified directly with {QLoggingCategory::operator()}{operator()()} or data(), then QMatrix4x4 will lose track of the special type and will revert to the safest but least efficient operations thereafter.
trans-unit.target: 通常，在执行操作时，QMatrix4x4类会在内部跟踪此特殊类型。但是，如果使用{ QLoggingCategory :: operator（）} { operator（）（）}或data（）直接修改矩阵，则QMatrix4x4将失去对特殊类型的跟踪，此后将恢复为最安全但效率最低的操作。

trans-unit.source: Normally the shadergen tool should be run from your application's project folder, but it's also possible to instruct the tool to change its current working directory through the -C argument.
trans-unit.target: 通常，shadergen工具应从应用程序的项目文件夹中运行，但也可以通过 -C 参数指示该工具更改其当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: Normally there is no need to reimplement this function. However, there are cases that involve decisions based on both the physical device and the surface. These cannot normally be performed before making the QVulkanWindow visible since the Vulkan surface is not retrievable at that stage.
trans-unit.target: 通常，无需重新实现此功能。但是，有些情况下涉及基于物理设备和表面的决策。由于在该阶段无法检索Vulkan表面，因此通常无法在使QVulkanWindow可见之前执行这些操作。

trans-unit.source: Normally this operation is relatively fast (amortized constant time). QList is able to allocate extra memory at the beginning of the list data and grow in that direction without reallocating or moving the data on each operation. However if you want a container class with a guarantee of constant time prepend, use std::list instead, but prefer QList otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 通常，此操作相对较快（摊销的固定时间）。QList能够在列表数据的开头分配额外的内存，并朝该方向增长，而无需在每个操作上重新分配或移动数据。但是，如果您想要一个具有恒定时间前缀的容器类，请改用std :: list，但更喜欢QList。

trans-unit.source: Normally you do not need to use this class directly; QShortcut provides a higher-level interface to handle shortcut keys.
trans-unit.target: 通常，您不需要直接使用此类。QShortcut提供了一个更高级别的界面来处理快捷键。

trans-unit.source: Normally you don't need to call this function; the garbage collector will automatically be invoked when the QJSEngine decides that it's wise to do so (i.e. when a certain number of new objects have been created). However, you can call this function to explicitly request that garbage collection should be performed as soon as possible.
trans-unit.target: 通常，您不需要调用此函数。当QJSEngine决定这样做时，垃圾收集器将被自动调用（即，当创建了一定数量的新对象时）。但是，您可以调用此函数来明确请求应尽快执行垃圾回收。

trans-unit.source: Normally you will use the function QDomDocument::implementation() to get the implementation object.
trans-unit.target: 通常，您将使用函数QDomDocument :: implementation（）获取实现对象。

trans-unit.source: Normally, QDebug prints the data inside quotes and transforms control or non-US-ASCII characters to their C escape sequences (\xAB). This way, the output is always 7-bit clean and the string can be copied from the output and pasted back into C++ sources, if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 通常，QDebug打印引号内的数据，并将控件或非US-ASCII字符转换为它们的C转义序列（\ xAB）。这样，输出始终是7位纯净的，并且可以根据需要从输出中复制字符串并将其粘贴回C ++源代码中。

trans-unit.source: Normally, QPainter draws in a "natural" coordinate system, but it is able to perform view and world transformations using the QTransform class. For more information, see Coordinate System, which also describes the rendering process, i.e. the relation between the logical representation and the rendered pixels, and the benefits of anti-aliased painting.
trans-unit.target: 通常，QPainter会绘制“自然”坐标系，但是它能够使用QTransform类执行视图和世界变换。有关更多信息，请参见坐标系统，该系统还描述了渲染过程，即逻辑表示与渲染像素之间的关系，以及抗锯齿绘画的好处。

trans-unit.source: Normally, QPainter draws in a "natural" coordinate system, but it is able to perform view and world transformations using the QTransform class. For more information, see Coordinate System, which also describes the rendering process, i.e. the relation between the logical representation and the rendered pixels, and the benefits of anti-aliased painting.
trans-unit.target: 通常，QPainter会绘制“自然”坐标系，但是它能够使用QTransform类执行视图和世界变换。有关更多信息，请参见坐标系统，该系统还描述了渲染过程，即逻辑表示与渲染像素之间的关系以及抗锯齿绘画的好处。

trans-unit.source: Normally, a vertical wheel will produce a PointerScrollEvent with positive delta values if the top of the wheel is rotating away from the hand operating it. Similarly, a horizontal wheel movement will produce a PointerScrollEvent with positive delta values if the top of the wheel is moved to the left.
trans-unit.target: 通常，如果垂直方向盘的顶部远离操作它的手旋转，则垂直方向盘将产生一个具有正增量值的PointerScrollEvent。同样，如果将轮子的顶部向左移动，则水平轮子的移动将产生一个具有正增量值的PointerScrollEvent。

trans-unit.source: Normally, a vertical wheel will produce a WheelEvent with positive delta values if the top of the wheel is rotating away from the hand operating it. Similarly, a horizontal wheel movement will produce a QWheelEvent with positive delta values if the top of the wheel is moved to the left.
trans-unit.target: 通常，如果垂直方向盘的顶部远离操作它的手旋转，则垂直方向盘将产生带有正增量值的WheelEvent。类似地，如果将轮子的顶部向左移动，则水平轮子的移动将产生具有正增量值的QWheelEvent。

trans-unit.source: Normally, a vertical wheel will produce a QWheelEvent with positive delta values if the top of the wheel is rotating away from the hand operating it. Similarly, a horizontal wheel movement will produce a QWheelEvent with positive delta values if the top of the wheel is moved to the left.
trans-unit.target: 通常，如果垂直方向盘的顶部远离操作它的手旋转，则垂直方向盘将产生具有正增量值的QWheelEvent。类似地，如果将轮子的顶部向左移动，则水平轮子的移动将产生具有正增量值的QWheelEvent。

trans-unit.source: Normally, an empty line edit shows the placeholder text even when it has focus. However, if the content is horizontally centered, the placeholder text is not displayed under the cursor when the line edit has focus.
trans-unit.target: 通常,空行编辑即使在有焦点时也会显示占位符文本。但是,如果内容是水平居中的,当行编辑有焦点时,占位符文本不会显示在光标下。

trans-unit.source: Normally, each managed widget or layout is put into a cell of its own using addWidget(). It is also possible for a widget to occupy multiple cells using the row and column spanning overloads of addItem() and addWidget(). If you do this, QGridLayout will guess how to distribute the size over the columns/rows (based on the stretch factors).
trans-unit.target: 通常，每个托管窗口小部件或布局都使用addWidget（）放入其自己的单元格中。小部件还可以使用addItem（）和addWidget（）的行和列跨重载来占用多个单元格。如果这样做，QGridLayout将猜测如何在列/行上分配大小（基于拉伸因子）。

trans-unit.source: Normally, the QPainter operates on the device's own coordinate system (usually pixels), but QPainter has good support for coordinate transformations.
trans-unit.target: 通常，QPainter在设备自身的坐标系（通常为像素）上运行，但是QPainter对坐标转换具有良好的支持。

trans-unit.source: Normally, the Next button and the Finish button of a wizard are mutually exclusive. If isFinalPage() returns true, Finish is available; otherwise, Next is available. By default, isFinalPage() is true only when nextId() returns -1. If you want to show Next and Final simultaneously for a page (letting the user perform an "early finish"), call setFinalPage(true) on that page. For wizards that support early finishes, you might also want to set the HaveNextButtonOnLastPage and HaveFinishButtonOnEarlyPages options on the wizard.
trans-unit.target: 通常，向导的“ 下一步”按钮和“ 完成”按钮是互斥的。如果isFinalPage（）返回 true ，则Finish是可用的；否则，下一步可用。默认情况下，仅当nextId（）返回-1 时，isFinalPage（）才为true 。如果你想显示下一个和最后同时对页面（让用户执行“提前结束”），呼叫setFinalPage该网页上（真）。对于支持早期完成的向导，您可能还需要设置HaveNextButtonOnLastPage和HaveFinishButtonOnEarlyPages 向导上的选项。

trans-unit.source: Normally, the QPainter operates on the device's own coordinate system (usually pixels), but QPainter has good support for coordinate transformations.

trans-unit.source: Normally, you connect each menu action to a single slot using QAction::triggered(), but sometimes you will want to connect several items to a single slot (most often if the user selects from an array). This signal is useful in such cases.

trans-unit.source: Not all layouts should necessarily be mirrored. There are cases where a visual type is positioned to the right side of the screen for improved one-handed use, because most people are right-handed, and not because of the reading direction. In the case that a child type should not be affected by mirroring, set the LayoutMirroring.enabled property for that type to false.
trans-unit.target: 并非所有布局都必须镜像。在某些情况下，可视类型位于屏幕的右侧以改善单手使用，因为大多数人都是右手使用，而不是因为阅读方向。如果子类型不受镜像影响，请将该类型的LayoutMirroring.enabled属性设置为false。

trans-unit.source: Not all properties of a Position object are necessarily valid or available (for example latitude and longitude may be valid, but speed update has not been received or set manually). trans-unit.target: 并非Position对象的所有属性都必须有效或可用（例如，纬度和经度可能有效，但是尚未收到或未手动设置速度更新）。结果，相应的“有效”属性可用（例如，坐标和经度有效度，纬度有效度等）来识别数据在此位置更新中是否可用且有效。

trans-unit.source: Not all properties of an Address are necessarily available or relevant in all parts of the world and all locales. The district, state and county properties are particularly area-specific for many data sources, and often only one or two of these are available or useful.

trans-unit.source: Not all surfaces will block until the presentation of a frame has completed. trans-unit.source: Note for developers implementing classes derived from QIODevice: you should always emit readyRead() when new data has arrived (do not emit it only because there's data still to be read in your buffers). Do not emit readyRead() in other conditions.

trans-unit.source: Note how the cylinder is not present in DEPTH_TEXTURE due to its reliance on semi-transparency, which puts it into a different category than the other objects that are all opaque. These objects do not write into the depth buffer, although they do test against the depth values written by opaque objects, and rely on being rendered in back to front order. Hence they are not present in DEPTH_TEXTURE either.
trans-unit.target: 注意，由于圆柱体依赖于半透明性，因此圆柱体在 DEPTH_TEXTURE 中不存在，这使圆柱体与其他所有不透明的对象归为不同类别。尽管这些对象会根据不透明对象写入的深度值进行测试，并依赖于以从前到后的顺序进行渲染，但它们不会写入深度缓冲区。因此，它们也不存在于 DEPTH_TEXTURE 中。

trans-unit.source: Note that QDialog (and any other widget that has type Qt::Dialog) uses the parent widget slightly differently from other classes in Qt. A dialog is always a top-level widget, but if it has a parent, its default location is centered on top of the parent's top-level widget (if it is not top-level itself). It will also share the parent's taskbar entry.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，QDialog（以及其他所有类型为 Qt::Dialog 的窗口小部件）使用的父窗口小部件与Qt中的其他类略有不同。对话框始终是顶级窗口小部件，但是如果对话框具有父窗口小部件，则其默认位置位于父窗口的顶级窗口小部件的顶部（如果它本身不是顶级窗口小部件）。它还将共享父级的任务栏条目。

trans-unit.source: Note that QDomNamedNodeMap does not inherit from QDomNodeList. QDomNamedNodeMaps do not provide any specific node ordering. Although nodes in a QDomNamedNodeMap may be accessed by an ordinal index, this is simply to allow a convenient enumeration of the contents of a QDomNamedNodeMap, and does not imply that the DOM specifies an ordering of the nodes.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，QDomNamedNodeMap不会从QDomNodeList继承。QDomNamedNodeMaps不提供任何特定的节点顺序。尽管可以通过序号索引访问QDomNamedNodeMap中的节点，但这仅是为了方便枚举QDomNamedNodeMap的内容，并不意味着DOM指定了节点的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Note that QOpenGLWidget expects a standard conformant implementation of resource sharing when it comes to the underlying graphics drivers. Some other drivers may behave in unexpected ways when trying to utilize shared resources between different threads.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，对于基础图形驱动程序，QOpenGLWidget期望资源共享的标准一致性实现。例如，某些驱动程序，特别是用于移动和嵌入式硬件的驱动程序，在设置现有上下文与稍后创建的其他上下文之间的共享时会遇到问题。当尝试利用不同线程之间的共享资源时，某些其他驱动程序可能会以意外的方式运行。

trans-unit.source: Note that Attractor has the standard Item x,y,width and height properties. Like other affectors, these represent the affected area. They do not represent the 0x0 point which is the target of the attraction.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,吸引器具有标准的Item x,y,width和height属性。和其他影响器一样,这些属性代表了受影响的区域,但不代表0x0点,因为0x0点是吸引的目标。它们并不代表0x0点,而0x0点是吸引器的目标。

trans-unit.source: Note that CBOR maps are unordered, which means that two maps containing the very same pairs but in different order will still compare differently. To avoid this, it is recommended to insert elements into the map in a predictable order, such as by ascending key value. In fact, maps with keys in sorted order are required for Canonical CBOR representation.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,CBOR地图是无序的,这意味着包含相同对但顺序不同的两个地图仍然会有不同的比较。为了避免这种情况,建议以可预测的顺序将元素插入到地图中,例如通过升序键值。事实上,对于Canonical CBOR表示来说,键值按排序的地图是必须的。

trans-unit.source: Note that IPv6 unique local unicast addresses are considered global addresses (see isUniqueLocalUnicast()), as are IPv4 addresses reserved for local networks by RFC 1918.

trans-unit.source: Note that QDialog (and any other widget that has type Qt::Dialog) uses the parent widget slightly differently from other classes in Qt. trans-unit.source: Note that QOpenGLWidget expects a standard conformant implementation of resource sharing when it comes to the underlying graphics drivers. trans-unit.source: Note that any of the id values defined in SquareButton.qml are not accessible to SquareButton objects, as id values are only accessible from within the component scope in which a component is declared. trans-unit.source: Note that both the QML engine and the JavaScript engine will automatically generate their own caches of type-data about observed types. Every component loaded by an application is a distinct (explicit) type, and every element (component instance) that defines its own custom properties in QML is an implicit type. Any element (instance of a component) that does not define any custom property is considered by the JavaScript and QML engines to be of the type explicitly defined by the component, rather than its own implicit type.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,QML引擎和JavaScript引擎都会自动生成自己的关于观察类型的类型数据缓存。应用程序加载的每个组件都是一个独特的(显式)类型,而在QML中定义了自己的自定义属性的每个元素(组件实例)都是一个隐式类型。任何没有定义任何自定义属性的元素(组件实例)被JavaScript和QML引擎认为是组件显式定义的类型,而不是自己的隐式类型。

trans-unit.source: Note that buttons (such as QPushButton) are often implemented not to care whether the press and release occur close together: if you press the button and then change your mind, you need to drag all the way off the edge of the button in order to cancel the click. For this use case, set the gesturePolicy to TapHandler.ReleaseWithinBounds.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，按钮（例如QPushButton）的实现通常并不关心按下和释放是否同时发生：如果您按下按钮然后改变主意，则需要将按钮一直拖离按钮的边缘。取消点击。对于这种使用情况，设置gesturePolicy到 TapHandler.ReleaseWithinBounds 。

trans-unit.source: Note that composition transformation operates pixelwise. For that reason, there is a difference between using the graphic primitive itself and its bounding rectangle: The bounding rect contains pixels with alpha == 0 (i.e the pixels surrounding the primitive). These pixels will overwrite the other image's pixels, effectively clearing those, while the primitive only overwrites its own area.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,构图变换是按像素操作的。因此,使用图形基元本身和它的边界矩形是有区别的。边界矩形包含alpha=0的像素(即基元周围的像素)。这些像素将覆盖其他图像的像素,有效地清除这些像素,而基元只覆盖自己的区域。

trans-unit.source: Note that for an application- or module-wide cleanup, qAddPostRoutine() is often not suitable. For example, if the program is split into dynamically loaded modules, the relevant module may be unloaded long before the QCoreApplication destructor is called. In such cases, if using qAddPostRoutine() is still desirable, qRemovePostRoutine() can be used to prevent a routine from being called by the QCoreApplication destructor. For example, if that routine was called before the module was unloaded.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，对于应用程序或模块范围的清理，qAddPostRoutine（）通常不适合。例如，如果将程序拆分为动态加载的模块，则相关模块可能在调用QCoreApplication析构函数之前就已卸载。在这种情况下，如果使用qAddPostRoutine（）仍然希望，qRemovePostRoutine（）可以被用于防止一个例程从由被称为QCoreApplication析构函数。例如，如果在卸载模块之前调用了该例程。

trans-unit.source: Note that for historical reasons this function returns QPoint(left() + width() -1, top() + height() - 1).

trans-unit.source: Note that for icons to appear in buttons in a QDialogButtonBox, you need to set the dialogbuttonbox-buttons-have-icons property to true. Also, to customize the size of the icons, use the icon-size property.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，要使图标出现在QDialogBu​​ttonBox的按钮中，您需要将dialogbuttonbox-buttons-have-icons属性设置为true。另外，要自定义图标的大小，请使用icon-size属性。

trans-unit.source: Note that for nested Flickables with pressDelay set, the pressDelay of outer Flickables is overridden by the innermost Flickable. If the drag exceeds the platform drag threshold, the press event will be delivered regardless of this property.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,对于设置了 pressDelay 的嵌套 Flickables,外部 Flickables 的 pressDelay 会被最内部的 Flickable 覆盖。如果拖动超过了平台拖动阈值,则无论此属性如何,都将交付新闻事件。

trans-unit.source: Note that for some plain text strings containing XML meta-characters, the auto-text rich text detection test may fail causing your plain text string to be interpreted incorrectly as rich text. In these rare cases, use Qt::convertFromPlainText() to convert your plain text string to a visually equivalent rich text string, or set the text format property explicitly with setTextFormat().
trans-unit.target: 请注意，对于某些包含XML元字符的纯文本字符串，自动文本富文本格式检测测试可能会失败，从而导致您的纯文本字符串被错误地解释为富文本。在这些罕见的情况下，使用Qt :: convertFromPlainText（）将纯文本字符串转换为视觉上等效的富文本字符串，或者使用setTextFormat（）显式设置文本格式属性。

trans-unit.source: Note that for the moment, alpha masks on monochrome images are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,目前,单色图像上的alpha遮罩会被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Note that for the single selection mode, the current item will be in the selection. In the multi-selection and extended selection modes, the current item may not lie within the selection, depending on the way the user formed the selection.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,在单选模式下,当前项目将在选区中,在多选和扩展选择模式下,当前项目可能不在选区中,这取决于用户形成选区的方式。在多选和扩展选择模式下,根据用户形成选择的方式,当前项目可能不在选择范围内。

trans-unit.source: Note that for the tool to generate the expected materials it will need to know about the whole scene and not just the material(s), for example the number of lights in the scene does also affect how the materials get generated, so all relevant qml files should be added to the list of files the tool needs to process.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,为了让工具生成预期的材质,它需要了解整个场景,而不仅仅是材质,例如场景中的灯光数量也会影响到材质的生成方式,所以所有相关的qml文件都应该被添加到工具需要处理的文件列表中。

trans-unit.source: Note that for views with a large content size (more than 10 times the view size), the velocity of the flick may exceed the velocity of the touch in the case of multiple quick consecutive flicks. This allows the user to flick faster through large content.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,对于内容尺寸较大的视图(超过视图尺寸的 10 倍),在多次快速连续轻触的情况下,轻触的速度可能会超过触摸的速度。这使得用户可以更快地浏览大型内容。

trans-unit.source: Note that fromString() uses a "C" locale encoded string to convert milliseconds to a float value. If the default locale is not "C", this may result in two conversion attempts (if the conversion fails for the default locale). This should be considered an implementation detail.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,fromString()使用 "C "语言编码的字符串来将毫秒转换为浮点数,如果默认的locale不是 "C",则可能会导致两次转换尝试(如果默认locale转换失败)。如果默认的locale不是 "C",这可能会导致两次转换尝试(如果默认locale的转换失败)。这应该被认为是一个实现细节。

trans-unit.source: Note that function values, variant values, and QObject values are objects, so this function returns true for such values.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，函数值，变量值和QObject值是对象，因此此函数对此类值返回true。

trans-unit.source: Note that if highlightRangeMode is set to StrictlyEnforceRange the currentIndex will be affected by dragging/flicking the view, since the view will always ensure that the currentIndex is within the highlight range specified.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果将 highlightRangeMode 设置为 StrictlyEnforceRange ，则拖动/轻拂视图会影响currentIndex，因为该视图将始终确保 currentIndex 在指定的突出显示范围内。

trans-unit.source: Note that if a KeyNavigation attached property receives the key press and release events for a requested arrow or tab key, the event is accepted and does not propagate any further.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果附加的KeyNavigation属性接收到所请求的箭头或Tab键的按下和释放事件，则该事件将被接受并且不会进一步传播。

trans-unit.source: Note that if a KeyNavigation attached property receives the key press and release events for a requested arrow or tab key, the event is accepted and does not propagate any further.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,如果KeyNavigation附加属性接收到请求的箭头或tab键的按键按压和释放事件,该事件就会被接受,并且不会进一步传播。

trans-unit.source: Note that if a binding cannot be optimized by the QML engine's optimized binding expression evaluator, and thus must be evaluated by the full JavaScript environment, some of the tips listed above will no longer apply. For example, it can sometimes be beneficial to cache the result of property resolution in an intermediate JavaScript variable in a very complex binding. Upcoming sections have more information on these sorts of optimizations.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,如果一个绑定不能由QML引擎的优化绑定表达式评估器进行优化,因此必须由完整的JavaScript环境进行评估,那么上面列出的一些提示将不再适用。例如,在一个非常复杂的绑定中,将属性解析的结果缓存在一个中间的JavaScript变量中有时是有益的。即将到来的部分有更多关于这类优化的信息。

trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果此处未列出控件元素，则是因为它使用了普通的QStyleOption对象。

trans-unit.source: Note that if a model is reset it should be considered that all information previously retrieved from it is invalid. This includes but is not limited to the rowCount() and columnCount(), flags(), data retrieved through data(), and roleNames().
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果重置模型，则应认为先前从模型中检索到的所有信息均无效。这包括但不限于rowCount（）和columnCount（），标志（），通过data（）检索的数据和roleNames（）。

trans-unit.source: Note that if a primitive element is not listed here, it is because it uses a plain QStyleOption object.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果此处未列出原始元素，那是因为它使用普通的QStyleOption对象。

trans-unit.source: Note that if a widget is set as modified, all its ancestors will also be set as modified. However, if you call setWindowModified(false) on a widget, this will not propagate to its parent because other children of the parent might have been modified.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果将小部件设置为已修改，则其所有祖先也将被设置为已修改。但是，如果在窗口小部件上调用 setWindowModified(false) ，它将不会传播到其父级，因为可能已修改了该父级的其他子级。

trans-unit.source: Note that if changeSize() is called after the spacer item has been added to a layout, it is necessary to invalidate the layout in order for the spacer item's new size to take effect.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,如果在间隔项被添加到布局后调用changeSize(),则必须使布局无效,才能使间隔项的新尺寸生效。

trans-unit.source: Note that if creating a functions object via this method that the QOpenGLContext retains ownership of the object. This is to allow the object to be cached and shared.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果通过此方法创建函数对象，则QOpenGLContext保留该对象的所有权。这是为了允许对象被缓存和共享。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the destination manager is to facilitate saving and cross-referencing from any arbitrary manager, it internally must accommodate saving of arbitrary key value pairs since we cannot know the provider names before hand, nor can we know what structure the ids will be.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,如果目的管理器要方便从任何任意管理器中保存和交叉引用,它内部必须适应保存任意键值对,因为我们无法事先知道提供者名称,也无法知道id是什么结构。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the documentation immediately precedes the function or class in the source code, then it does not need to have a topic. QDoc will assume that the documentation above the code is the documentation for that code.
trans-unit.target: 注意,如果文档紧接在源代码中的函数或类之前,那么它就不需要有主题。QDoc会认为代码上面的文档就是该代码的文档。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the entity is unknown, the reader reports it through QXmlContentHandler::skippedEntity() and not through this function.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果该实体未知，那么读者将通过QXmlContentHandler :: skippedEntity（）而不是通过此函数来报告它。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the event is a multiple-key compressed event that is partly due to auto-repeat, this function could return either true or false indeterminately.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,如果事件是一个多键压缩事件,部分是由于自动重复,这个函数可以不确定地返回真或假。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the item is being moved, this property holds the index that the item is moving to, not from.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,如果项目被移动,这个属性持有项目移动到的索引,而不是从哪里来。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the logicalDpiX() doesn't equal the physicalDpiX(), the corresponding QPaintEngine must handle the resolution mapping.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果logicalDpiX（）不等于physicalDpiX（），则相应的QPaintEngine必须处理分辨率映射。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the logicalDpiY() doesn't equal the physicalDpiY(), the corresponding QPaintEngine must handle the resolution mapping.

trans-unit.source: Note that if the source is a local file, the status will initially be Ready (or Error). While there will be no onStatusChanged signal in that case, the onLoaded will still be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,如果源是本地文件,初始状态将是Ready(或Error)。虽然在这种情况下不会有onStatusChanged信号,但仍然会调用onLoaded。
